abstract: The company’s strong quarterly results and optimistic outlook suggest that a weakening economy will not slow it down.
snippet: The company’s strong quarterly results and optimistic outlook suggest that a weakening economy will not slow it down.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft reported quarterly sales and profit gains that surpassed Wall Street’s expectations and delivered an optimistic outlook Thursday, suggesting that a weakening economy would not slow it down.

headline.main: Microsoft Delivers Strong Growth and Includes a Sunny Forecast
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Delivers Strong Growth And Includes a Sunny Forecast
